knimeNode.name: Counting Loop Start
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node at the start of a loop

fullDescription.intro: The LoopStart is the node that starts a loop that is executed a predefined number of times. At the end of the loop you need LoopEnd, which collects the results from all loop iterations. All nodes in between are executed as many times as you specify in the dialog of LoopStart.
fullDescription.option: The number of times the inner workflow should be executed.
fullDescription.link: KNIME E-Learning Course: Section 7.2. Re-executing Workflow Parts: Loops
